snippet: Texas Gov. Rick Perry decided Wednesday that he would remain in the presidential race and campaign in South Carolina.
abstract: Texas Gov. Rick Perry decided Wednesday that he would remain in the presidential race and campaign in South Carolina.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and KATHARINE Q. SEELYE

lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas, who said after the Iowa caucuses that he would return to Texas to "assess" whether there was a path for him to the Republican nomination, decided on Wednesday that there is a way forward.

headline.main: Assessment Complete - Perry to Stay in Race
